Package com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.map_features.adapters

package com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.map_features.adapters
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.map_features
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ContinentAdapter
    ContinentAdapter class provides methods to interact with continents in the map editor.
    ContinentServiceTest
    Tests the adding and removing of continent
    CountryAdapter
    The CountryAdapter class provides methods to add and remove countries from the game map.
    CountryNeighborAdapter
    Provides functionality to add or remove neighbor countries for a given country.
    CountryNeighborServiceTest
    Tests the adding and removing of neighbours of the country.
    CountryServiceTest
    This class tests the add and remove operations on country.
    EditMapAdapter
    EditMapAdapter class represents an adapter for editing maps.
    EditMapAdapterTest
    Test cases for the EditMapAdapter class.
    LoadMapAdapter
    LoadMapAdapter class implements the StandaloneCommand interface to handle the loading of map features.
    LoadMapServiceTest
    This class tests the empty fields available in the map file.
    SaveMapAdapter
    This class represents an adapter for saving a map to a file.
    SaveMapServiceTest
    Test cases for the map file to check if save is successful or not are contained in this class
    ShowMapAdapter
    The ShowMapAdapter class provides methods to display continent-country content and neighbor countries of each country in a map.
    ShowMapServiceTest
    Test cases for the ShowMapAdapter class methods are contained in this class
    ValidateMapAdapter
    This class represents a ValidateMapAdapter which implements StandaloneCommand.
    ValidateMapServiceTest
    This class entails test cases for the ValidateMapAdapter class which has different types of validation requires for Map.
